channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #pt @ 1450597474608066564
item.description:
Copie a planilha de 50 colunas para o Word. Imprima na impressão rascunho, passe a tarde inteira scaneando de maneira torta. Gere um pdf de imagem. E mande o jornalista vir buscar o arquivo resultante num CD-ROM.
Parabéns você gabaritou na prova de Dados Abertos Arrombados. https://t.co/hbRTdNHmEE

item.title: #en @ 1450510624719519744
item.description: TY @GovKathyHochul for signing the MTA Open Data act. W/ today’s signing, the MTA will have to make its data available to the public & easy to manipulate. This will make the MTA more accountable to the millions of NYers who rely on subways/buses to go about their daily lives. https://t.co/1ToWZiagaK

item.title: #en @ 1450509854771236871
item.description:
Brokerages should have tax optimized orders
Put in your desired trade and the brokerage will figure out the tax-optimal way to get the same exposure, closing the trade when you hit long-term cap gains or otherwise specified
W open data, easy to bring to on-chain DEXs

item.title: #es @ 1450509152481157123
item.description: Estimados @Minsa_Peru el archivo publicado hoy en datos abiertos https://t.co/FfcnIBsxLd Han duplicado registros de personal de salud q recibieron tercera dosis, aparece como si fueran seis (6) dosis, se requiere corregirlo. El total dice 33,4 MM y sólo son 32MM @PeruPaisDigital https://t.co/V1wXP01era

item.title: #nl @ 1450506949418786823
item.description:
Het aantal eerste prikken (33.000) is nu op een zeer laag niveau.
Het aantal tweede prikken (57.000) is lager dan vorige week (60.000).
Er zíjn vorige week 3de prikken gezet. Maar het RIVM vertikt het (natuurlijk) om dat in (open) data te gooien. 🤬😡🤬
https://t.co/CdluZnHMDu https://t.co/KqScyXjska

item.title: #en @ 1450494068065247243
item.description:
Thrilled to see @RachaelFauss' leading effort on MTA Open Data Act come to fruition, supported by @cbcny & other good government advocates.
I'm interested hourly ridership to assess how peak load curves have shifted--it's essential for future fare policy & service evaluation https://t.co/dFbqxuxNeZ

item.title: #ja @ 1450461803499171851
item.description:
本日のJTUG Radio Nightでデモした気象庁データは、早ければ今週中にもPrepper Open Data Bankでリリース予定です。全国約1300箇所のアメダス・気象台・測候所の観測データを月別と日別で公開します。
もうしばらくお待ち下さい。
#JTUGRadioNight #Prepper

item.title: #en @ 1450431890310238212
item.description: Most mobility analysis this past year tracks the movement of smartphones, not people. Our new study finds that in low income countries where few people have smartphones, those estimates can be substantially biased. @smilusheva3 @leonardo_viotti (1/10) https://t.co/PoS9QPyR08

item.title: #en @ 1450295959309721600
item.description: @Win_OpenData @jenni_pro I don't suggest applying based on pressure. But, I do suggest applying to jobs that you think you may want to pursue. Yes, you are being interviewed, but you are also interviewing them. The process of applying to a job can help you decide if you truly want it.

item.title: #en @ 1450164418516561931
item.description:
It ought to be simple: if you run a train *anywhere* on *any track* in EU, you have to make all - timetable data - ticketing data - live running data available in an open data format, for a fair price
That'd be the single step that'd make the biggest change to cross border rail https://t.co/sdn9L5G3xY

item.title: #en @ 1450076193290555402

item.title: #en @ 1449705257634701313
item.description: And suddenly all the connecting work - all the relational trail making - took a serendipitous turn. And I was reminded yet again that the point of open data is not to interconnect records but to provide the conditions for opening ourselves to each other. [end]
